name: System Analyst
description:
Together to the next level?

CRIF is a global company specializing in credit bureau and business information, outsourcing and processing services, and credit solutions.

Description:

  • analysis and formalization of clients' business processes within the scope of these processes automation projects using CRIF's software, solutions and methodology.

Responsibilities:

  • negotiating with client and project team to define the scope of the project, goals and functional requirements;
  • detailed analysis of business requirements, preparation of technical requirements, conducting modification approvals with the client;
  • participation in the solutions design along with the development team, requirements' decomposition and setting tasks for developers;
  • participation in the SCRUM-team as an analyst;
  • responsible for the problem investigation and resolution;
  • responsible for project's documents flow (project specifications, strategy definition, statements of work, change request, problem reports etc.);

Your profile:

  • 1 year of business or system analysis experience;
  • implementing complex software solutions for the banking sector is preferable;
  • degree in Economics, Financials or IT;
  • experience in working within virtual and multi-cultural teams will be considered a plus;
  • fluent English communication skills;
  • basic knowledge of relational DBMS and SQL (at the level of writing simple queries);
  • basics understanding of database design;
  • understanding of the principles of work and design of REST API and work of WEB-applications (experience in Swagger will be a plus);
  • ability to independently understand the principles of the system;
  • ability to use modeling notations (UML, BPMN);
  • experience in creating technical documentation, forming User Stories;
  • experience with Confluence and JIRA, understanding of Scrum / Agile principles

We offer:

  • attractive and performance-orientated salary package;
  • convenient office location 5 minutes walk from m. Oktyabrskaya;
  • remote work during the quarantine.
